title: Annual report
context: [ยง326-25.5] Annual report. The department of health shall submit a report to the legislature no later than twenty days prior to the convening of each regular session that addresses the following with regard to Kalaupapa Settlement: (1) The department&rsquo;s provision of medical and basic living needs of the patients; (2) The department&rsquo;s progress toward defining and addressing the nonmedical needs of patients; (3) The department&rsquo;s progress toward promoting a positive living environment; (4) The department&rsquo;s management of state resources, including benefits given to employees that are not statutorily defined; (5) The department&rsquo;s progress toward establishing written policies and procedures for Kalaupapa store; (6) The department&rsquo;s progress toward establishing and maintaining a complaint file and adequately addressing complaints; (7) The performance of the administrator, including compliance with job duties; (8) The department&rsquo;s progress toward adequate accountability of state property; and (9) Details and justification of approved employee air travel requests and trail pay. [L 2004, c 232, ยง2]
